d: Yuri is a fancy zipless cardigan based on the Huey & Hugo hoodies

s.cutHoodCenter.t: The hood center is not shown
s.cutHoodCenter.d: The **Hood center** is a rectangular piece of fusible interfacing {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long (this includes seam allowance). The hood center not shown because the **expand** core setting is currently disabled. Enable it to show this pattern part.

hipsEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at the hips
